main.description: We are pragmatic professionals, creating reliable software for the web.
main.services.title: Platforms, Consulting & Products
main.services.text:
We enjoy technology and look forward to new challenges. We focus on long-term commitments in the Group's business.
We always approach new tasks with appropriate respect. We always strive for high-quality and contemporary solutions - the choice of technology is secondary for us. We would be happy to support you in the following disciplines:
main.career.title: Work with us
main.career.text: We are looking for developers with passion! You don't have much work experience yet? No problem. You will learn everything you need to know. You are already an expert? You will get opportunities and challenges to grow further with your experienced colleagues. Take a look at our open positions. We look forward to receiving your application.
main.blog.title: Ping, Echo, Printf
main.blog.text: Find best practices, interesting bits of technology and news about Satellytes and the team
career.title: Career
career.subheading: We are looking for passionate developers!
career.headline: Apply now
career.info-text: Please upload relevant files e.g. CV, cover letter or references. You can upload 3 pdf-documents with a maximal size of 20 MB each.
career.privacy-policy: <0>I hereby confirm that i have taken note of the <1>privacy policy</1>.  <4>*</4></0>
career.introduction.headline: Work with us
career.introduction.paragraphs.0: We are Satellytes, a team of highly experienced developers and some designers. We bring sustainable, accessible, reliable and modern web solutions to large companies. If you are interested in joining us, check out our open positions right now.
career.application-process.headline: Application process
career.application-process.paragraph: Applying for a job can often be frustrating. That's why our team has come up with something that makes sense. Check out our four steps of your application here.
career.application-process.accordion.0.p: Everything starts with your application. Send us your CV and a short cover letter explaining why you are applying to us. In your application, we don't look for school grades, we look for your passion for coding. Show us your GitHub or GitLab account. Do you have a blog? Then feel free to link to it.
career.application-process.accordion.1.p: If we find your application convincing, we will invite you to a first interview. One or two of your future colleagues will talk to you about how you got into programming and what drives you. After that, we will know you better and you will know the first faces behind Satellytes.
career.application-process.accordion.2.p: We don't do whiteboard interviews, nor do we send any programming tasks. Instead, you'll do a code review in advance, which we'll then talk through together in the interview. We'll discuss issues in the code and touch on a bit of expertise about relevant technologies. Besides all the technical stuff, we'll also have time to talk a bit about our culture at Satellytes to make sure you feel comfortable working with us.
career.application-process.accordion.3.p: You have shown what you can do and how you're working. We have shown what drives us and how we work. If everything fits, we let you know. If something doesn't fit, we'll let you know that too.
career.openings.headline: Open Positions
career.culture.headline: Enjoying the work
career.culture.paragraph: We want to create the conditions for everyone to develop personally and professionally.
career.culture.teaser.0.title: Cross-Functional
career.culture.teaser.0.description: Mixed teams of designers, product managers, developers, support staff, marketing specialists and more bring the right combination of know-how and experience to ensure that people think outside the box.
career.culture.teaser.1.title: Self-organisation
career.culture.teaser.1.description: Each team at Satellytes is responsible for its own tasks. In the words of the Agile Manifesto: "The best architectures, requirements and designs are created by self-organized teams"
career.culture.teaser.2.title: Agile
career.culture.teaser.2.description: Fast feedback, short decision-making processes and open mindedness are important to us - whether you call it Scrum, Kanban or XP.
career.culture.teaser.3.title: Fail fast
career.culture.teaser.3.description: When we try something new, we always risk failure. That's the ideal way to learn from mistakes, share insights with others and turn them into successes in the next situation.
career.culture.teaser.4.title: Feedback
career.culture.teaser.4.description: Feedback is our most important tool. Code reviews, pair programming, daily stand-up meetings, 360-degree feedback and more give everyone the opportunity to constantly improve.
career.culture.teaser.5.title: Open Work
career.culture.teaser.5.description: Being open, listening, respecting other opinions and finding the best solutions together.
career.perk.headline: Perks & Benefits
career.perk.paragraph: In addition to a great team, interesting tasks and a modern working environment, we also offer a few extras.
career.perk.teaser.0.title: Time for experiments
career.perk.teaser.0.description: You'll get time & space to try out new technologies or conduct small experiments with colleagues
career.perk.teaser.1.title: Always learning
career.perk.teaser.1.description: You will learn something with us every day, whether you consider yourself a beginner or a professional. If you're lacking the muse yourself, then a colleague will surely know how to inspire you shortly afterwards. If you ever need a book: every book is on us.
career.perk.teaser.2.title: Favorite gear
career.perk.teaser.2.description: MacBook vs. Linux laptop, mouse vs. trackpad or VSCode vs. IntelliJ. You have the choice with us.
career.perk.teaser.3.title: Work from anywhere
career.perk.teaser.3.description: You can flexibly choose your working hours and place of work after consultation with the team & customers.
career.perk.teaser.4.title: Conferences
career.perk.teaser.4.description: We love tech conferences and have often been visitors and sometimes even speakers. We'll pay for your ticket, room and board. Want to become a speaker? We support you.

services.title: What we offer
services.text:
We enjoy technology and look forward to new challenges. We focus on long-term commitments in the group's business.
We always approach new tasks with appropriate respect. We always strive for high-quality and contemporary solutions - the choice of technology is secondary for us. We would be happy to support you in the following disciplines.
services.platform.title: Digitale Platforms
services.platform.text: We are specialists for digital platforms from the idea to the implementation. Our many years of experience in designing B2B and B2C platforms from a wide range of industries make us the ideal partner for your project.
services.consulting.title: Consulting
services.consulting.teaser: The experience of our employees is our most valuable treasure.
services.consulting.text: The experience of our employees is our most valuable treasure. We share it with you and advise you in technical and conceptual matters.
services.products_services.title: Products & Services
services.products_services.teaser: From Ideation to Rollout. We support you.
services.products_services.text: We support your next product or service with our experts.
